div.p: Event Types for Audit Events - defined by DICOM with some FHIR specific additions.

Copyright Statement: These codes are excerpted from Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine (DICOM) Standard, Part 16: Content Mapping Resource, Copyright © 2011 by the National Electrical Manufacturers Association.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/audit-event-type defines the following codes:

tr.td: Audit Event: Execution of a RESTful operation as defined by FHIR.

description.value: Event Types for Audit Events - defined by DICOM with some FHIR specific additions.
